mapper.sql: from ${dataTable} D, C_GP GP, C_MP MP, C_METER M, G_TG TG, O_ORG O

choose.when: select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO, GP.CT_TIMES, GP.PT_TIMES, GP.CT_TIMES * GP.PT_TIMES as TOTAL_TIMES, TO_CHAR(D.DATA_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_TIME, D.P_ACT_TOTAL, D.I_ACT_TOTAL, D.P_REACT_TOTAL, D.I_REACT_TOTAL

select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO, GP.CT_TIMES, GP.PT_TIMES, GP.CT_TIMES * GP.PT_TIMES as TOTAL_TIMES, TO_CHAR(D.DATA_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_TIME, D.ACT_POWER, D.ACT_POWER_A, D.ACT_POWER_B, D.ACT_POWER_C, D.REACT_POWER, D.REACT_POWER_A, D.REACT_POWER_B, D.REACT_POWER_C

select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO, GP.CT_TIMES, GP.PT_TIMES, GP.CT_TIMES * GP.PT_TIMES as TOTAL_TIMES, TO_CHAR(D.DATA_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_TIME, D.POWER_FACTOR, D.POWER_FACTOR_A, D.POWER_FACTOR_B, D.POWER_FACTOR_C

select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO, GP.CT_TIMES, GP.PT_TIMES, GP.CT_TIMES * GP.PT_TIMES as TOTAL_TIMES, TO_CHAR(D.DATA_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_TIME, D.ECUR_A, D.ECUR_B, D.ECUR_C, D.ECUR_L, D.VOLT_A, D.VOLT_B, D.VOLT_C
